DescriptionData.Title: Self-Adhesive Jewels - Pearl Hearts, approx. 25/pk
DescriptionData.Description: Heart shaped plastic gems are great to add glitz and bling to designs.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Assorted colors (Pink, Purple, Red, White) & sizes, 1/4" - 3/4"
Self adhesive; no need for extra adhesive
Includes small part; not recommended for small children.

DescriptionData.Title: Glimmer Body Art Glitter Tattoo Stencils - Single Bat 5/pk
DescriptionData.Description:
Glitter tattoo Stencils are a perfect way to apply picture perfect glittery tattoos on any skin surface whether it's a cheek or hand. Glimmer Body Art Glitter tattoo Stencils are so easy to use that even a beginner can create amazing looks in minutes.
The Glimmer Body Art Glitter tattoo Stencils are 2 in x 2 in and have three layers for easy transfer to the skin. They are non-latex, hypoallergenic, waterproof and can last up to 7 days. The adhesive is medical-grade, and it won't leave a sticky residue on the skin.
Glitter tattoos should only be used once and are not recommended for use on the face or eyes. Great for parties and events: create your Glitter Tattoo today! 5/pack
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Glimmer Body Art Glitter Tattoo Stencils are non-latex, hypoallergenic and meet all cosmetic grade safety standards
Glitter Tattoos should not be applied to the face or eyes, and stencils should be used only once
Glimmer Body Art Stencils come in a 5 pack
Glitter Tattoos are waterproof and can last up to 7 days
